long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed exclusively to facilitate the autofilling of email addresses, usernames, passwords, and TOTP codes into website input fields when you focus on them. The data is retrieved from the 1LimX PC application, which must be open and unlocked.

All request authorizations, data processing, and decryption during the autofill process are performed locally, with no data leaving the user's device. This ensures a secure and efficient login experience without any unrelated functionalities.
